name: @flippercloud/flipper-cache
description: Generic cache wrapper for Flipper TypeScript adapters (read-through/write-through).
author: Jonathan Hoyt

scripts.build: bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs
scripts.clean: node -e "try { require('fs').rmSync('dist', {recursive:true, force:true}); require('fs').rmSync('coverage', {recursive:true, force:true}); } catch(e) {}"
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build && bun test
